## Get data
```{r}
playerbox <- playerboxscore(
    "~/Dropbox/17-wnba-player/wnba-season-player-feed-06-09-2017.xlsx"
)
View(playerbox)
gamebox <- gameboxscore(playerbox)
View(gamebox)
salaries <- read_csv(
  "/home/Projects/draftkings/contest-standings/wnba/20170611/FanDuel-WNBA-2017-06-11-19683-players-list.csv",
  col_types = cols(
    X14 = col_skip(),
    X15 = col_skip()
  )
)
View(salaries)
decoder <- tribble(
  ~fanduel, ~bigdataball,
  "MIN", "Minnesota",
  "DAL", "Dallas",
  "WAS", "Washington",
  "SEA", "Seattle",
  "NY", "New York",
  "IND", "Indiana",
  "PHO", "Phoenix",
  "LA", "Los Angeles",
  "ATL", "Atlanta",
  "CON", "Connecticut",
  "CHI", "Chicago",
  "SA", "San Antonio"
)
View(decoder)
games <- salaries$Game %>%
  unique() %>%
  str_split_fixed(pattern = "@", n = 2) %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  left_join(decoder, by = c("V1" = "fanduel")) %>%
  left_join(decoder, by = c("V2" = "fanduel")) %>%
  select(away = bigdataball.x, home = bigdataball.y)
View(games)
```
